title: High Ping
body: I played 2 games today and both have 263ping and stays there it made me rage and quite 2 games I have no idea why it has high ping,im not downloading anything I set my settings to the lowest and still stays in 163ping pls fix this!!!

replies.body:
What ping do you normally see?
What ISP are you with?
Was anyone else using your internet at that same time?
